reviewText:
This is the "Best step by step WordPress tutorial"

Because of the great information I got from Kent's Ebook.  I decided to go ahead and order this DVD.

  If you are new to WordPress, don't look any further.  This is the fist DVD you should get + Kent's E-Book "How To Build a Website With WordPress...Fast! (2nd Edition - Read2Learn Guides)"  With both his DVD Video Tutorial + Book, you are in good hands and you should have your first WordPress Website up and running in no time.

I recently bought your DVD entitled "How to build a website with Wordpress...Fast!" and I would like to congratulate you on an impressive job you have done in those videos. The videos are easy to follow, but I never thought that using Wordpress was actually much simpler than Dreamweaver (Don't get me wrong I am Dreamweaver user myself, but I try to move on to simpler design; hence Wordpress).
Thank you very much again for such a good job you are making. Once I am done watching the DVD (I am still on disc 1) I will re-watch it and take some notes in order to build a site on my own. Also I think that it will be a great idea if the same concept is done for joomla. I think that you should do it Kent. I bet it will be as successful as this one. Thanks again!
